content:
Hello all!

Sorry if this isn't the place, or I'm doing something I shouldn't be, but I was wondering if there was a way to start the FCP process for https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83574 (std::iter::zip)? If there is any way I can help, please let me know, as I'm eager to contribute, despite my limited understanding of the process by which these things happen.

Thanks!

PS. I'm also super duper new to rust development, so I asked a question earlier that lead to the rust dev guide that said to ping someone from t-libs-api, and this is the channel that is the closest. My apologies if this is incorrect or if I'm missing something.
For future reference libs and libs API share this stream.
